data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Currie, Douglas C., Hunter, Fiona F. (2003): A new species of Stegopterna Enderlein, and its relationship to the allotriploid species St. mutata (Malloch, 1914) (Diptera: Simuliidae). Zootaxa 214: 1-11, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156344
